basics.name: Kameron Robinson
basics.label: Full stack web developer & Student
basics.summary: Kameron was born in Baltimore city at JHU. He soon ventured into the world as a curious, sometimes mischievous kid. He discovered his love for programming in his sophomore year of college and is now pursuing a degree in Information Systems at University of Maryland Baltimore County. He is always learning new things and working hard to improve old skills!

work.summary: Apple revolutionized personal technology with the introduction of the Macintosh in 1984. Today, Apple leads the world in innovation with iPhone, iPad, the Mac and Apple Watch. Apple’s three software platforms — iOS, OS X and watchOS — provide seamless experiences across all Apple devices and empower people with breakthrough services including the App Store, Apple Music, Apple Pay and iCloud. Apple’s 100,000 employees are dedicated to making the best products on earth, and to leaving the world better than we found it.
highlights: Successfully provide a great customer experience
Participate as an active member of a large team to enrich lives

work.summary: Mission is a design and digital agency that believes great work comes from the heart, mind and gut.  We are focused on helping our partners effectively utilize their owned media and native content to increase awareness, influence perception, inspire action and foster a brand's growth.
highlights: Successfully designed and implemented web pages
Participated as an active member of a small development team
Learned how to navigate CMS, design more semantic web pages, and architecture css for the long run

work.summary: In the Vally doing cool things with a team.

courses: IS436 - Structured Systems Analysis and Design

awards.title: Code2040 Fellow
awards.summary: CODE2040's flagship program places top performing Black and Latino/a college level computer science students from around the country in an intensive summer career accelerator in the San Francisco Bay Area. Students intern at top tech companies and participate in a series of career building sessions on evenings and weekends.

publications.name: bckpckr
publications.publisher: Kameron Robinson, Saif Khan, & Ari Krumbein
publications.summary: An application targeted toward people who love to travel! Type in where you're headed and get back some handy information. -Built at Mhacks hackathon
